title: Eufora Curl'n Defining Solution 6oz
features: Styling Foam - Unlike mouses or gels, this unique light styling foam is ideal for creating soft, bouncy, lasting curls that are soft and touchable but last throughout the day.
Volumizing Foam - This frizz removing styling foam is built for fine, limp curls that need a fuller finish with shine. This curl styling product will give your curls long-lasting style.

Helps Control Frizz -Volume to your style without a sticky or stiff feel. This go-so-big blend helps fine, limp strands look lusher and thicker. Lasting hold without crunch-feel. Fights the effects of humidity.
Hair Form Volumizing - Moisturizing ingredients like proteins and Shea Butter to defrizz, detangle, and tame even the unruliest curls while still letting your natural curls run free.
How to Use - Apply to damp hair with a light scrunching motion. Use fingers to form curl patter. Diffuse or let air dry. Layer with Forming Cream for added hold.
